content: Client secret successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when client secrets are successfully copied to the clipboard. It appears as a toast notification in a UI component, providing feedback to users after they have copied sensitive information.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'buferə' is likely a misspelling of 'bərfə'.

The translation 'Тайната на клиента е успешно копирана в системния буфер' is a literal translation that is less natural in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be to use a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Клиентският секрет е успешно копиран в клипборда.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սեղմատախտակում' (slegmatakhdakam) is technically correct, but 'դիրքի սեղմատախտակ' (dirgi slegmatakhdak) or simply 'սեղմատախտակ' (slegmatakhdak) is more commonly used and natural-sounding in modern Armenian to refer to a clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հաճախորդի գաղտնի բանալին հաջողությամբ պատճենվեց դիրքի սեղմատախտակում

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄວາມລັບ' (khwam lap) which means 'secret' is correct, but the phrase 'ຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້' (khong phou sai) which translates to 'of the user' is slightly awkward in this context. It's unnecessary to explicitly state it's a user secret.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄວາມລັບຖືກສໍາເນົາເຂົ້າໃນແຜ່ນກົດແລ້ວ (khwam lap thuk sam nea khao nai phan kot laeo) - 'The secret was successfully copied to the clipboard.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the Lao sentence structure is a bit formal. A more natural phrasing might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄວາມລັບຖືກສໍາເນົາເຂົ້າໃນແຜ່ນກົດແລ້ວ (khwam lap thuk sam nea khao nai phan kot laeo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'succesvol' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'succesvol'.

The Romanian sentence uses 'a fost copiat' (was copied), which is grammatically correct but a more natural phrasing in this context would be 'a fost copiată'. The subject 'cheia' (key) is feminine, so the auxiliary verb needs to agree.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cheia secretă a clientului a fost copiată cu succes în clipboard

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'සේවාදායක' (sevaadaayak) is a somewhat formal and less common way to say 'client' in this context. A more natural and frequently used term would be 'අයදුම්කරු' (ayadumkarau).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අයදුම්කරු රහස සාර්ථකව ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් එකට පිටපත් කරන ලදී

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් එකට' is understandable, using 'ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත' is slightly more formal and reads a little better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අයදුම්කරු රහස සාර්ථකව ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත පිටපත් කරන ලදී

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Skrivnost odjemalca je bila uspešno kopirana v odložišče' is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the natural flow of the English phrase. 'Odložišče' is technically correct for 'clipboard', but sounds overly formal and not idiomatic in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and idiomatic translation might be: 'Gešča odjemalčeve skrivnosti je bila uspešno kopirana v odložišče' or 'Ključna beseda odjemalca je bila uspešno kopirana v odložišče'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'међумеморију' is not the standard term for clipboard in Serbian. It refers to a cache memory.
The word 'međumemorija' is commonly translated as 'clipboard' but 'iskaznica' is also a valid and more precise translation in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tajni ključ klijenta uspešno kopiran u iskaznicu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'tạm' is slightly awkward in this context. While technically correct, it can sound less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'clipboard' instead of 'bộ nhớ tạm'. A possible alternative translation would be 'Đã sao chép client secret vào clipboard thành công.'
